Name: Elysian
Ingredients: 60 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Dry and aromatic, although not for all tastes.
History: Created in 2004 by Mickael Perron at Millbank Lounge Bar, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Elysian contains 217 calories
